definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: In Azerbaijan, detection of the virus has coincided with die-offs of domestic birds.
sentences.chinese: 在阿塞拜疆，病毒的發現與家禽的相繼死亡同時發生。

sentences.english: There is also a Twelver Shia minority, mainly of Azeri descent.
sentences.chinese: 還存在着少數什葉派穆斯林，主要是阿塞拜疆系的。

sentences.english: The building boom began after the country had won in the Eurovision Song Contest.
sentences.chinese: 建築狂潮在阿塞拜疆獲得在歐洲歌唱大賽勝利後開始。

sentences.english: 1920 - Azerbaijan is added to the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 1920年的今天，阿塞拜疆加入蘇聯。

sentences.english: China supports Azerbaijan's accession to the World Trade Organization (WTO).
sentences.chinese: 中國支持阿塞拜疆加入世界貿易組織。

sentences.english: Mandarin Chinese and Azeri language broadcasts on radio also stopped today.
sentences.chinese: 中文普通話和阿塞拜疆語廣播也於今天停播。

sentences.english: The Azerbaijan Culture Ministry could not be reached for comment.
sentences.chinese: 阿塞拜疆文化部沒有做出評論。

sentences.english: Today is an official holiday in Azerbaijan.
sentences.chinese: 今天是阿塞拜疆的官方假日。

sentences.english: The people of Azerbaijan elect the National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 國會由阿塞拜疆的人民選舉產生。

definition: Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania
Turkmenistan/Republic of Turkmenistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Iran

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
